segments.text: It was very kind of you to give me a tour of the place . It gave me a good idea of your product range .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s a pleasure to show our factory to our customers . What ’ s your general impression , may I ask ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Very impressive , indeed , especially the speed of your NW Model .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s our latest development . A product with high performance . We put it on the market just two months ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The machine gives you an edge over your competitors , I guess .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly . No one can match us as far as speed is concerned .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you give me some brochures for that machine ? And the price if possible .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Right . Here is our sales catalog and literature .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I think we may be able to work together in the future .
segments.speaker: S1
